###    🚀 新功能

- **tip**: 增加游戏路径检查提示  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(14737)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/14737aa0)

###    🐛 修复

- GetDarkThemeLight  -  by @Hill23333 [<samp>(66966)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/66966b49)
- BlurChanged  -  by @Hill23333 [<samp>(78b70)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/78b7099d)

- 信息框背景色叠加  -  by @Hill23333 [<samp>(79384)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/79384fb5)
- **Crash**: 没有导出最新的日志  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(0c8dc)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/0c8dcf2c)
- **Logger**: 修复高占用问题  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(85a54)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/85a54527)
- **ci**: 不应该运行两次 changlog 制作  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(5139a)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/5139a6dc)
- **theme**: 正版登录提示框阴影颜色有误  -  by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/910 [<samp>(7ef4e)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/7ef4ed12)

###    ⚡ 优化

- **Configure**:
  - 优化配置文件的获取和写入  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(03a3e)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/03a3e188)
- **Logger**:
  - 优化 Dispose  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(d7a00)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/d7a0085b)
  - 优化日志写入  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(0965a)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/0965ac9a)
- **blur**:
  - 模糊作用地调整与类型纠正  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(f1d37)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/f1d3791d)

###    🔧 重构

- **db**: 换用 LiteDB 代替 SQLite  -  by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/908 [<samp>(177c4)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/177c4e46)
